site.name: Tilo Agency
site.description: Modern digital agency specializing in strategic partnerships and digital growth solutions.

home.heroSubtitle: Tilo Agency is your premier digital services partnership platform. We connect talented partners with opportunities for growth and success.

sections.title: Why Choose Us
sections.content: Our platform offers comprehensive digital services support, from technical setup to client base growth strategies. Join thousands of successful partners who trust us.

sections.title: Ready to Get Started?
sections.content: Let's discuss how we can help transform your digital presence.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Tilo Agency is your premier digital services partnership platform. We connect talented partners with opportunities for growth and success.

services.title: Why Choose Us
services.description: Our platform offers comprehensive digital services support, from technical setup to client base growth strategies. Join thousands of successful partners who trust us.

services.title: Get Started Today
services.description: We provide competitive compensation packages and full support for our digital services partners. Your success is our priority.

services.title: Base Compensation
services.description: We offer competitive base compensation for all digital services partners based on clientship and engagement metrics.

services.title: Performance Bonuses
services.description: Additional performance bonuses are awarded monthly for exceeding client goals and maintaining consistent digital services schedules.

services.title: Additional Benefits
services.description: Partners receive full technical support, promotional assistance, and access to exclusive digital services tools and resources.

sections.heading: General Conduct
content: All digital services partners must adhere to our community guidelines and maintain professional conduct during delivers.
Maintain professional behavior at all times
Meet minimum digital services hour requirements

sections.heading: Content Guidelines
content: Content must be appropriate for the platform and follow all applicable laws and regulations. Prohibited content includes harmful or offensive material.

sections.heading: digital services Requirements
content: partners are expected to maintain a minimum digital services schedule of 20 hours per week to remain in good standing.

sections.heading: Payment Terms
content: Payments are processed monthly based on client engagement and subscription metrics. All transactions are transparent and trackable.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions about partnership opportunities? We're here to help! Reach out to our team and we'll respond within 24 hours.
